glossdef.para: An application that runs inside ohOS
The open source stack used by ohOS, including the UPnP implementation.
OpenHome Operating System. The operating system installed on Nodes using the OpenHome software.
Proxy Device List Provider. The pattern used to represent the layers of UPnP in the OpenHome code. All layers except the Presentation layer are represented in this pattern.
Universal Plug and Play. The network protocols set out by the UPnP Forum to allow networked devices to seamlessly establish connections and services.
